start.text: We're putting an end to this party.
They always return to the scene of the crime.
They used to call me obsessed. Now, they call me their solution.
Roger, tally ho. Let's chase these dogs off.
Don't get cocky. Cornered animals tend to lash out.

start_boss.text: You, solely, are responsible for this.
Every safety's coming off. No second chances.
I will bury you so completely, the earth will turn over a thousand times before your body is dug up.
Sheep are to be protected, and yet wolves like you have to be fed. Do you see the problem here? We are the sheepdogs.

retreat.text: All allied elements, pull back. Use the nebulae as cover.
He got lucky. Return to base.
All allied elements, break pursuit, push for our waypoint.

out_of_missiles.text: [sighs] We're short on fuel and ammo.
We're low on ammo and fuel to engage, my bird might be sluggish.

engaged.text: Me and you, now. No distractions, no wingmen, no war.
You've taken too much. You'll lose everything in turn.

pursuing.text: Keep it simple. They're not worth the effort.
They're not getting away. Open fire.
Adjust your tactics and reform the attack pattern.
Come back here. You've made this personal.

running.text: I'm not risking any losses because of this bloodthirsty dog.
We've done all we can. We're getting out of here.

hull_90.text: You can't run! You can't hide! You made this decision long ago!
I'm Persean! You think I take joy fighting over my homeland?! Killing my own countrymen?!
What do you have to show for yourself, dog? Blood and gold? A broken throne?
Just me and you; whoever wins is the best pilot.

hull_50.text: You don't even care why you're here!
Do you even understand what you're doing?! You're getting in the way of world peace!
The Collapse erased mankind once! Our chance to start again! This is how you've dealt with it?!
Millions of lives lost... So many ghosts. Kill me, or be killed!

hull_30.text: Here we are, fighting for the Sector's soul. That's the deal you made, right?
What happens when you shoot me down?! Can you even think?! What will you return to?! Where will you go?! We both know how this ends!
Kill me! Kill me and see what happens to this world!
The sector might try to forget about you, but I won't! This is for the good of mankind!
Come on, come in for that kill, you dog!

overload.text: Come on, I've almost got him!

death.text: When you hear the thunder... when the storm... comes for you... remember me.
I should've killed you when I had the chance.

victory.text: The world will prove you wrong, even if you win this war. But it's not like you'll live to see it.
At the end of the day, you were just a criminal, looking for your next handout.
